C

Card - Class in classes
Implements a card in a blackjack game.
Card(String) - Constructor for class classes.Card
Constructor for class Card, receives a card and examines it, indentifying it.
checkAces() - Method in class classes.Basic
Verifies if the player's hand contains aces.
checkArgs(String[]) - Static method in class classes.Interactive
Checks if the input arguments received are in conformity with the project specifications.
checkArgs(String[]) - Static method in class classes.Simulation
Receives the input arguments and verifies if their values are in conformity with the project specifications.
checkDoubleDown() - Method in class classes.Player
Returns the value of the local variable doubleDown.
checkHandType() - Method in class classes.Basic
Verifies the type of hand of the player.
checkInsurance() - Method in class classes.Hand
Checks if an insurance is possible to be made.
checkStrat(String) - Method in class classes.Simulation
Receives the strategy to be used through the game and verifies if it's one of the supported strategies.
classes - package classes
Contains the classes necessary to implement a blacjack game with three game modes: interactive, debug and simulation.
